description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省南部，是济宁市代管的一个县级市，儒家学派创始人孔子的故乡。
description.en: A county-level city in southern Shandong province, China, administered by Jining. It is the hometown of Confucius, the founder of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋末期思想家、政治家、教育家，儒家学派创始人。
description.en: A Chinese teacher, politician, and philosopher of the late Spring and Autumn period, and the founder of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 孔子最得意的弟子，儒家重要人物，被后世尊为“复圣”。
description.en: The favorite disciple of Confucius and a major figure in Confucianism, revered as the "Sage Second to Confucius".

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋末期史学家，相传为《左传》作者。
description.en: A historian of the late Spring and Autumn period in China, traditionally credited with authoring the Zuo Zhuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋末期工匠和发明家，被尊为中国工匠的始祖。
description.en: A Chinese carpenter and inventor of the late Spring and Autumn period, revered as the patron saint of Chinese builders and contractors.

description.zh-cn: 由孔子创立的中国古代思想流派，对东亚文化圈有深远影响。
description.en: A school of thought founded by Confucius in ancient China, with profound influence on the East Asian cultural sphere.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝的一个诸侯国，以“礼义之邦”著称，定都曲阜长达八百余年。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou dynasty of ancient China, known as the 'State of Rites and Propriety', with its capital at Qufu for over 800 years.

description.zh-cn: 周朝的开国君主。
description.en: The first king of the Zhou dynasty of ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 周武王的弟弟，周朝初年杰出的政治家，被封为鲁公。
description.en: Brother of King Wu of Zhou, an outstanding statesman in the early Zhou dynasty, enfeoffed as the Duke of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 周公旦之子，鲁国的第一代国君。
description.en: Son of the Duke of Zhou and the first ruler of the State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期位于南方的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state in southern China during the Zhou dynasty.

en: Liu Liu and Liu Qi rebellion

description.zh-cn: 明朝正德年间在山东等地爆发的农民起义。
description.en: A peasant rebellion that broke out in Shandong and other areas during the Zhengde era of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曲阜在隋代至1986年间的行政区划名称。
description.en: The administrative name for Qufu from the Sui dynasty until 1986.

description.zh-cn: 位于曲阜市，是祭祀孔子的庙宇，为中国三大古建筑群之一。
description.en: Located in Qufu, it is a temple for the veneration of Confucius and one of the three great ancient architectural complexes in China.

description.zh-cn: 孔子嫡系长支世代居住的府第，有“天下第一家”之称。
description.en: The historical residence of the direct descendants of Confucius, known as the "Number One Family Under Heaven".

description.zh-cn: 孔子及其家族的墓地，是世界上延时最久、规模最大的家族墓地。
description.en: The cemetery of Confucius and his descendants, the oldest and largest clan cemetery in the world.

description.zh-cn: 联合国专门机构之一，旨在通过教育、科学及文化来促进各国合作。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations aimed at promoting world peace and security through international cooperation in education, arts, sciences and culture.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founder and first emperor of the Han dynasty.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝之子，西汉鲁国第一代国王，封为鲁恭王。
description.en: Son of Emperor Jing of Han, the first king of the Lu Kingdom of the Western Han dynasty, known as King Gong of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 孔子在世时居住的宅院。
description.en: The residence where Confucius lived.

description.zh-cn: 位于曲阜石门山上的佛教寺庙。
description.en: A Buddhist temple located on Shimen Mountain in Qufu.

description.zh-cn: 中国唐代伟大的浪漫主义诗人，被后人誉为“诗仙”。
description.en: A Chinese poet acclaimed from his own day to the present as a genius and a romantic figure who took traditional poetic forms to new heights.

description.zh-cn: 清朝戏曲家，孔子第六十四代孙，代表作为《桃花扇》。
description.en: A Qing dynasty dramatist and poet, a 64th-generation descendant of Confucius, best known for his play The Peach Blossom Fan.

description.zh-cn: 曲阜是儒家学派创始人孔子的故乡。
description.en: Qufu is the hometown of Confucius, the founder of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 曲阜是孔子弟子颜回的故乡。
description.en: Qufu is the hometown of Yan Hui, a disciple of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 曲阜是史学家左丘明的故乡。
description.en: Qufu is the hometown of the historian Zuo Qiuming.

description.zh-cn: 曲阜是工匠鲁班的故乡。
description.en: Qufu is the hometown of the artisan Lu Ban.

description.zh-cn: 孔子是儒家学派的创始人。
description.en: Confucius is the founder of the Confucian school of thought.

description.zh-cn: 曲阜作为鲁国都城，历经了八百七十三年历史。
description.en: Qufu served as the capital of the State of Lu for 873 years.

description.zh-cn: 周武王将弟弟周公旦分封于曲阜，建立鲁国。
description.en: King Wu of Zhou enfeoffed his younger brother, the Duke of Zhou, at Qufu, establishing the State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 周公旦是周武王的弟弟。
description.en: The Duke of Zhou was the younger brother of King Wu of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 伯禽是周公旦的儿子，替父亲领国。
description.en: Bo Qin was the son of the Duke of Zhou and ruled the state on his father's behalf.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期，鲁国被楚国灭亡。
description.en: At the end of the Warring States period, the State of Lu was conquered by the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 1511年，刘六、刘七领导的民变攻下曲阜县城。
description.en: In 1511, the rebellion led by Liu Liu and Liu Qi captured Qufu County town.

description.zh-cn: 民变军队在孔庙内饲马驻军，对孔庙造成破坏。
description.en: The rebel army stationed troops and fed horses inside the Temple of Confucius, causing damage.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，联合国教科文组织将曲阜孔庙列入世界遗产名录。
description.en: In 1994, UNESCO inscribed the Temple of Confucius in Qufu on the World Heritage List.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，联合国教科文组织将孔府列入世界遗产名录。
description.en: In 1994, UNESCO inscribed the Kong Family Mansion on the World Heritage List.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，联合国教科文组织将孔林列入世界遗产名录。
description.en: In 1994, UNESCO inscribed the Cemetery of Confucius on the World Heritage List.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时，汉高祖刘邦以祭天的仪式来祭孔子，提升了孔子的地位。
description.en: During the Western Han dynasty, Emperor Gaozu of Han honored Confucius with a ceremony typically reserved for worshipping Heaven, elevating Confucius's status.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，曲阜被中国国务院定为国家历史文化名城。
description.en: In 1982, Qufu was designated as a National Famous Historical and Cultural City by the State Council of China.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝鲁恭王刘余为修建灵光殿，曾拆坏孔子旧居。
description.en: Liu Yu, King Gong of Lu during the Han dynasty, demolished parts of Confucius's former residence to build the Lingguang Palace.

description.zh-cn: 诗人李白曾到石门寺游览并留下诗句。
description.en: The poet Li Bai visited Shimen Temple and left behind poems.

description.zh-cn: 清朝戏曲家孔尚任曾经一度居住在石门寺。
description.en: The Qing dynasty dramatist Kong Shangren once resided in Shimen Temple.
